name: koa-markdown
description: Auto convert markdown to html for koa. Inspired by connect-render

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -r should test/*.test.js
